statements: SELECT id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE id = 1;
SELECT action, user_id, id, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT id, action FROM audit_trail WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE id IN (2, 4);
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_trail ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_trail WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE action LIKE '%delete%';
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id IN (2, 3, 4) ORDER BY user_id, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_account WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_account WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM user_account ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM user_account WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_account WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id, MIN(id) AS min_id FROM audit_trail;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM audit_trail GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_account ORDER BY user_id ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_access_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, table_name FROM data_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, action_type, timestamp FROM data_changes WHERE table_name = 'products';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM data_changes WHERE action_type = 'INSERT' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM user_access_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, table_name, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, user_id, action FROM user_access_logs WHERE user_id IN (2, 5, 7) ORDER BY user_id, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id = 123;
SELECT timestamp, details FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM data_modification_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action LIKE '%login%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59'
SELECT system_log_id, log_level, timestamp FROM system_logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs WHERE request_type = 'GET' ORDER BY access_log_id ASC
SELECT id, username, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM data_access_logs WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, data_table, action, timestamp FROM data_modification_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT setting, username, action, timestamp FROM privacy_settings_logs WHERE action = 'updated' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_name, created_by, created_on FROM audit_report;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, action, timestamp FROM data_access_logs WHERE username = 'John Doe' AND action = 'View' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT data_table, action, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM data_modification_logs GROUP BY data_table, action ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT setting FROM privacy_settings_logs WHERE username = 'Alice' AND action = 'Change';
SELECT report_name, created_by, created_on FROM audit_report WHERE created_on BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
